Tamil Nadu.name: Ariyalur
Tamil Nadu.description: Known for limestone industries and ancient temples.

Tamil Nadu.name: Chengalpattu
Tamil Nadu.description: Part of Chennai region, known for industrial development.

Tamil Nadu.name: Chennai
Tamil Nadu.description: Capital city on the Coromandel Coast, cultural and IT hub.

Tamil Nadu.name: Coimbatore
Tamil Nadu.description: Manchester of South India, known for textiles and engineering.

Tamil Nadu.name: Cuddalore
Tamil Nadu.description: Coastal district famous for temples and beaches.

Tamil Nadu.name: Dharmapuri
Tamil Nadu.description: Known for Hogenakkal Waterfalls.

Tamil Nadu.name: Dindigul
Tamil Nadu.description: Famous for Sirumalai Hills and locks industry.

Tamil Nadu.name: Erode
Tamil Nadu.description: Known for turmeric production and textile industries.

Tamil Nadu.name: Kallakurichi
Tamil Nadu.description: Newly formed district, agricultural region.

Tamil Nadu.name: Kanchipuram
Tamil Nadu.description: Famous for silk sarees and ancient temples.

Tamil Nadu.name: Kanyakumari
Tamil Nadu.description: Southern tip of India where three seas meet.

Tamil Nadu.name: Karur
Tamil Nadu.description: Textile and bus body building hub.

Tamil Nadu.name: Krishnagiri
Tamil Nadu.description: Known for mango cultivation and granite.

Tamil Nadu.name: Madurai
Tamil Nadu.description: Temple city famous for Meenakshi Amman Temple.

Tamil Nadu.name: Mayiladuthurai
Tamil Nadu.description: Rich cultural heritage and temples on the Cauvery River.

Tamil Nadu.name: Nagapattinam
Tamil Nadu.description: Coastal town known for ports and Velankanni Church.

Tamil Nadu.name: Namakkal
Tamil Nadu.description: Known for poultry and transport industries.

Tamil Nadu.name: Nilgiris
Tamil Nadu.description: Hill district famous for Ooty and tea gardens.

Tamil Nadu.name: Perambalur
Tamil Nadu.description: Agricultural district with rich limestone deposits.

Tamil Nadu.name: Pudukkottai
Tamil Nadu.description: Historic district with archaeological sites.

Tamil Nadu.name: Ramanathapuram
Tamil Nadu.description: Home to Rameswaram Temple, a major pilgrimage site.

Tamil Nadu.name: Ranipet
Tamil Nadu.description: Industrial district known for leather goods.

Tamil Nadu.name: Salem
Tamil Nadu.description: Steel city of Tamil Nadu and mango cultivation area.

Tamil Nadu.name: Sivagangai
Tamil Nadu.description: Known for Chettinad cuisine and architecture.

Tamil Nadu.name: Tenkasi
Tamil Nadu.description: Scenic district near Western Ghats with waterfalls.

Tamil Nadu.name: Thanjavur
Tamil Nadu.description: Cultural hub known for Brihadeeswarar Temple and art.

Tamil Nadu.name: Theni
Tamil Nadu.description: Hill region famous for cardamom plantations.

Tamil Nadu.name: Thoothukudi
Tamil Nadu.description: Port city also known as Tuticorin, salt and pearl fisheries.

Tamil Nadu.name: Tiruchirappalli
Tamil Nadu.description: Historic city on the Cauvery River, rich in temples.

Tamil Nadu.name: Tirunelveli
Tamil Nadu.description: Known for Halwa, waterfalls and temples.

Tamil Nadu.name: Tirupathur
Tamil Nadu.description: Newly formed district known for leather industries.

Tamil Nadu.name: Tiruppur
Tamil Nadu.description: Textile export capital of India.

Tamil Nadu.name: Tiruvallur
Tamil Nadu.description: Industrial area near Chennai.

Tamil Nadu.name: Tiruvannamalai
Tamil Nadu.description: Spiritual town famous for Annamalaiyar Temple.

Tamil Nadu.name: Tiruvarur
Tamil Nadu.description: Birthplace of Saint Thyagaraja, rich in temples.

Tamil Nadu.name: Vellore
Tamil Nadu.description: Known for Vellore Fort and CMC Hospital.

Tamil Nadu.name: Viluppuram
Tamil Nadu.description: Largest district known for agriculture and heritage.

Tamil Nadu.name: Virudhunagar
Tamil Nadu.description: Famous for fireworks and match industries in Sivakasi.
